text: [Fùhuó rì] tāmen dōu jiāng chūxiànzài ān lā miànqián.[Nà shí] ruòzhě jiāng duì jiāo'ào zì dà zhě [shǒulǐng] shuō:“Wǒmen yuán shì zhuīsuí nǐmen de,[xiànzài] nǐmen néng bāngzhù wǒmen jiǎnqīng yīdiǎn er ān lā de xíngfá ma?” Tāmen jiāng shuō:“Jiǎrú ān lā yǐndǎo wǒmen, wǒmen jiù yǐndǎo nǐmen. Wúlùn wǒmen fānù háishì rěnshòu [xíngfá], duì wǒmen dōu shì yīyàng de,[xiàn zài] wǒmen wú chù kě táo.”
